branch_point.content:
{
  "name": "desktop",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "main": "electron/main.cjs",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "concurrently -k \"vite --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5174\" \"wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5174 && ELECTRON_START_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5174 electron .\"",
    "dev:web": "vite --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5174",
    "build": "tsc -b && vite build",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@insight/shared": "file:../../packages/shared",
    "@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu": "^2.1.16",
    "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area": "^1.2.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.1.13",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle": "^1.1.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle-group": "^1.1.11",
    "@supabase/supabase-js": "^2.87.1",
    "chrono-node": "^2.9.0",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "dexie": "^4.2.1",
    "framer-motion": "^12.23.26",
    "react": "^19.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.0",
    "react-markdown": "^10.1.0",
    "remark-gfm": "^4.0.1",
    "sonner": "^2.0.7",
    "tailwind-merge": "^3.4.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.1",
    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4.1.18",
    "@types/node": "^24.10.1",
    "@types/react": "^19.2.5",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.2.3",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^5.1.1",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.23",
    "concurrently": "^9.2.1",
    "electron": "^39.2.7",
    "eslint": "^9.39.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^7.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.24",
    "globals": "^16.5.0",
    "playwright": "^1.57.0",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.18",
    "tailwindcss-animate": "^1.0.7",
    "tsx": "^4.21.0",
    "tw-animate-css": "^1.4.0",
    "typescript": "~5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.46.4",
    "vite": "^7.2.4",
    "wait-on": "^9.0.3"
  }
}
